nodes.excerpt: Sizey is a MacOS app that helps you calculate aspect ratios! ⠀ — ⠀ ⚡️ Add Custom Aspect Ratios ⠀ 💥 Round to the nearest whole # ⠀ ➡️ Keyboard Shortcuts ⠀ 📐 Scale & Densities (@1x, @2x, @3x) ⠀ 🙌 Landscape & Portrait modes — ⠀ You design. We’ll math. ❤️📐
nodes.title: Sizey: Aspect Ratio Calculator - Instantly calculate any aspect ratio.
nodes.author: Meritt Thomas

localize.description: Sizey是一款MacOS应用程序，可以帮助您计算纵横比！⠀-⠀⚡️添加自定义纵横比⠀💥舍入到最接近的整数#⠀➡️键盘快捷键⠀📐比例和密度(@1x，@2x，@3x)⠀🙌横向和纵向模式-您设计的⠀。我们要学数学。❤️📐
localize.tagline: 即时计算任何纵横比。

localize.description: Sizey是一款MacOS應用程序，可以幫助您計算縱橫比！⠀-⠀⚡️添加自定義縱橫比⠀💥舍入到最接近的整數#⠀➡️鍵盤快捷鍵⠀📐比例和密度(@1x，@2x，@3x)⠀🙌橫向和縱向模式-您設計的⠀。我們要學數學。❤️📐
localize.tagline: 即時計算任何縱橫比。

nodes.excerpt: Hijack Your Feed is a Safari extenion that replaces Twitter ads with your todos. It creates eye-catching posts based on your Reminders, which are then hijacked into your Twitter feed. Designed to nudge you toward your intentions… and away from doom-scrolling.
nodes.title: Hijack Your Feed - Replace Twitter ads with your todos
nodes.author: Rodolfo Rosini

localize.description: hijack your Feed是一个Safari扩展，它用你的待办事项取代了Twitter广告。它根据你的提醒创建吸引眼球的帖子，然后这些帖子会被劫持到你的Twitter feed中。旨在将您推向您的意图…远离末日卷轴。
localize.tagline: 用您的待办事项替换Twitter广告

localize.description: hijack your Feed是一個Safari擴展，它用你的待辦事項取代了Twitter廣告。它根據你的提醒創建吸引眼球的帖子，然後這些帖子會被劫持到你的Twitter feed中。旨在將您推向您的意圖…遠離末日卷軸。

nodes.excerpt: Transcribe your YouTube video in one click and highlight the important stuff for easy and quick reading. you-tldr let's you skim through the video transcript and skip to the good stuff. You can also download the transcript for your records.

localize.description: 只需单击一下即可转录您的YouTube视频，并突出显示重要内容，以便轻松快速阅读。你-tldr让我们先浏览一下视频记录，然后跳到好的部分。您也可以下载文字记录作为您的记录。

localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內獲得任何YouTube視頻的tldr

nodes.excerpt: When you read an email you will see a numerical score just below the subject–a score between 0 and 100. A score of 100 means the email is very easy to read and a score of 0 means the email is very difficult to read.
nodes.title: Gmail inbox Readability Score - Calculating the readability score of an email
nodes.author: Argyrou Argyris

localize.description: 当你阅读一封电子邮件时，你会在主题下方看到一个数字分数-一个介于0到100之间的分数。分数100表示电子邮件非常容易阅读，分数0表示电子邮件很难阅读。
localize.tagline: 计算电子邮件的可读性分数

localize.description: 當你閱讀一封電子郵件時，你會在主題下方看到一個數字分數-一個介於0到100之間的分數。分數100表示電子郵件非常容易閱讀，分數0表示電子郵件很難閱讀。
localize.tagline: 計算電子郵件的可讀性分數

nodes.excerpt: Findnlink is a platform where you can share your projects and find co-founders/members. - Customize your project page - Create your own portfolio / profile - Show your skills We want to make Findnlink a great virtual workspace to connect teams together 👌
nodes.title: Findnlink - Find people to work with on your ideas.
nodes.author: Emil Hopf

localize.description: Findnlink是一个平台，您可以在其中共享您的项目并查找联合创始人/成员。-自定义您的项目页面-创建您自己的公文包/配置文件-展示您的技能我们希望使FindnLink成为将团队联系在一起的强大虚拟工作区👌
localize.tagline: 在你的想法上找到可以合作的人。

localize.description: Findnlink是一個平臺，您可以在其中共享您的項目並查找聯合創始人/成員。-自定義您的項目頁面-創建您自己的公文包/配置文件-展示您的技能我們希望使FindnLink成爲將團隊聯繫在一起的強大虛擬工作區👌
localize.tagline: 在你的想法上找到可以合作的人。
